title: Understanding People
description: Learn how to express understanding, empathy, and perspective-taking.

steps.teacher: 我能理解你的感受，這種事情真的不容易。
expected_answer: 我能理解你的感受，這種事情真的不容易。
steps.pinyin: wǒ néng lǐ jiě nǐ de gǎn shòu, zhè zhǒng shì qíng zhēn de bù róng yì.
steps.english_hint: I understand how you feel; it's really not easy.

steps.teacher: 有時候大家需要的只是被聽見。
expected_answer: 有時候大家需要的只是被聽見。
steps.pinyin: yǒu shí hòu dà jiā xū yào de zhǐ shì bèi tīng jiàn.
steps.english_hint: Sometimes what people need is simply to be heard.

steps.teacher: 我知道你已經很努力了。
expected_answer: 我知道你已經很努力了.
steps.pinyin: wǒ zhī dào nǐ yǐ jīng hěn nǔ lì le.
steps.english_hint: I know you've already worked very hard.

steps.teacher: 如果你需要休息，告訴我一聲就好。
expected_answer: 如果你需要休息，告訴我一聲就好。
steps.pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ xū yào xiū xí, gào sù wǒ yì shēng jiù hǎo.
steps.english_hint: If you need a break, just let me know.

steps.teacher: 每個人面對壓力的方式都不太一樣。
expected_answer: 每個人面對壓力的方式都不太一樣。
steps.pinyin: měi gè rén miàn duì yā lì de fāng shì dōu bù tài yí yàng.

steps.teacher: 我尊重你的選擇，也希望你能做得開心。
expected_answer: 我尊重你的選擇，也希望你能做得開心。
steps.pinyin: wǒ zūn zhòng nǐ de xuǎn zé, yě xī wàng nǐ néng zuò de kāi xīn.
steps.english_hint: I respect your choice and hope you're happy with it.

steps.teacher: 如果你願意，我可以陪你一起面對。
expected_answer: 如果你願意，我可以陪你一起面對。
steps.pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ yuàn yì, wǒ kě yǐ péi nǐ yì qǐ miàn duì.
steps.english_hint: If you're willing, I can face it with you.

steps.teacher: 先讓自己平靜下來，事情會更清楚。
expected_answer: 先讓自己平靜下來，事情會更清楚。
steps.pinyin: xiān ràng zì jǐ píng jìng xià lái, shì qíng huì gèng qīng chǔ.
steps.english_hint: Calm yourself first; everything becomes clearer.

steps.teacher: 我願意聽聽你的想法，不用急著回答。
expected_answer: 我願意聽聽你的想法，不用急著回答。
steps.pinyin: wǒ yuàn yì tīng tīng nǐ de xiǎng fǎ, bù yòng jí zhe huí dá.
steps.english_hint: I’m willing to hear your thoughts—you don’t need to answer right away.

steps.teacher: 我相信你會找到最好的方式處理這件事。
expected_answer: 我相信你會找到最好的方式處理這件事。
steps.pinyin: wǒ xiāng xìn nǐ huì zhǎo dào zuì hǎo de fāng shì chǔ lǐ zhè jiàn shì.
steps.english_hint: I believe you'll find the best way to handle this.

review.summary: You learned B1 expressions for empathy, support, and understanding.
